name: islandora-cwrc-writer
description: A wrapper to use CWRC-Writer with Islandora.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copyfiles && npm run build:js
scripts.copyfiles: npm run copy:images && npm run copy:css && npm run copy:html && npm run copy:xml && npm run copy:jstree && npm run tinymce:copyskin
scripts.cwrcDialogs: npm run cwrcDialogs:importcss && npm run cwrcDialogs:bootstrap
scripts.cwrcDialogs:importcss: copyfiles -f node_modules/cwrc-dialogs/css/cD.css build/css/cD/css/ && copyfiles -f node_modules/cwrc-dialogs/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.css build/css/cD/css/ && copyfiles -f "node_modules/cwrc-dialogs/font-awesome/fonts/*" build/css/cD/fonts/
scripts.build:js: mkdirp build/js && npm run cwrcDialogs && browserify src/js/app.js -o build/js/app.js --debug --verbose -g deamdify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.watch: watchify src/js/app.js --debug -o build/js/app.js --verbose -g deamdify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
